typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Incident_Type_Code as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Incident_Type_Code]\nFROM [relational].[OPS_Incident_Type]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalIncidentType
ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@ValidDateAndIncidentID, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidIncidentType@ValidIncidentType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
ConvertDateAndIncidentID split(not(isNull(Derived_Incident_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && iif(not(isNull(Incident_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Incident_Date)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@(ValidDateAndIncidentID, InvalidDateOrIncidentID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Incident_Date = toDate(Incident_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Incident_Id = toInteger(Incident_Id)) ~> ConvertDateAndIncidentID
InvalidDateOrIncidentIDerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrIncidentID
ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@InvalidDateOrIncidentID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Incident Date / Incident ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrIncidentIDerrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDateOrIncidentID, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidIncidentType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalIncidentType lookup(Incident_Type_Code == Relation_Incident_Type_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalIncidentType
RelationalIncidentType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Incident_Type_Code = Incident_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalIncidentType
LookupRelationalIncidentType split(not(isNull(Relation_Incident_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidIncidentType@(ValidIncidentType, InvalidIncidentType)
IsValidIncidentType@InvalidIncidentType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Incident Type Code")) ~> InvalidIncidentTypeerrormessage
InvalidIncidentTypeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidIncidentType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Operation_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Area_Treated as string,
		Treatment_Cost as string,
		Unit_Cost as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Date as string,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
source(output(
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Operation_Type as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> RelationalOperationType
ValidatedDerivedData@ValidDerivedData, SelectRelationalAsset lookup(Asset_ID == Relation_Asset_ID
	&& Fund_ID == Relation_Fund_ID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationAsset
IsValidOperationType@ValidOperationType select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
DerivedFields split(not(isNull(Derived_Operation_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && 
iif(not(isNull(Area_Treated)),not(isNull(Derived_Area_Treated)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Treatment_Cost)),not(isNull(Derived_Treatment_Cost)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Unit_Cost)),not(isNull(Derived_Unit_Cost)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate)),not(isNull(Derived_Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate)),true()) && 
iif(not(isNull(Last_Age_Class_Date)),not(isNull(Derived_Last_Age_Class_Date)),true()),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedDerivedData@(ValidDerivedData, InvalidDerivedData)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Last_Age_Class_Date = toDate(Last_Age_Class_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Operation_Id = toInteger(Operation_Id),
		Derived_Area_Treated = toDecimal(Area_Treated, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Treatment_Cost = toDecimal(Treatment_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Unit_Cost = toDecimal(Unit_Cost, 19, 4, "###,###.####"),
		Derived_Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate = toDecimal(Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate, 5, 2, "###.##")) ~> DerivedFields
InvalidDerivedDataErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDerivedData
ValidatedDerivedData@InvalidDerivedData derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Operation ID / Area Treated / Treatment Cost / Unit Cost / Last Age Class Date / Last Age Class Survival Rate")) ~> InvalidDerivedDataErrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
LookupRelationAsset split(not(isNull(Relation_Asset_ID)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedAsset@(ValidFundAndAsset, InvalidFundOrAsset)
ValidatedAsset@InvalidFundOrAsset derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Fund Or Asset")) ~> InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage
InvalidFundOrAsseterrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidFundOrAsset
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidDerivedData, SelectInvalidFundOrAsset, SelectInvalidOperationType union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
ValidatedAsset@ValidFundAndAsset, SelectRelationalOperationType lookup(Operation_Type_Code == Relation_Operation_Type_Code,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupRelationalOperationType
RelationalOperationType select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Operation_Type_Code = Operation_Type_Code
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalOperationType
LookupRelationalOperationType split(not(isNull(Relation_Operation_Type_Code)),
	disjoint: false) ~> IsValidOperationType@(ValidOperationType, InvalidOpeartionType)
IsValidOperationType@InvalidOpeartionType derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Operation Type Code")) ~> InvalidOperationTypeErrormessage
InvalidOperationTypeErrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidOperationType
UnionAll sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Operation_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Operation_Type_Code as string,
		Area_Treated as string,
		Treatment_Cost as string,
		Unit_Cost as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Date as string,
		Species_Survived as string,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Operation_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Operation_Type_Code,
		Area_Treated,
		Treatment_Cost,
		Unit_Cost,
		Last_Age_Class_Date,
		Species_Survived,
		Last_Age_Class_Survival_Rate,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

		Active_YN
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectValidRecord
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB split(not(isNull(Price_Point_Code)) && trim(Price_Point_Code) != '',

InvalidPricePointCodeerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Price_Point_Code,
		Price_Point,
		Active_YN,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidPricePointCode
ValidatedPricePointCode@InvalidPricePointCode derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Price Pint Code")) ~> InvalidPricePointCodeerrormessage
SelectValidRecord, SelectInvalidPricePointCode union(byName: true)~> UnionAll
UnionAll sink(input(
		Price_Point_Code as string,
		Price_Point as string,
		Active_YN as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,

		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB

		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,

FilterGetParent select(mapColumn(
		Lkp_UID = UID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectParentUIDlookup
DerivedNonNullParentUID, SelectParentUIDlookup lookup(Derived_NonNull_ParentUID == Lkp_UID,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupParentUID
LookupParentUID derive(Validation_Error = iif(isNull(Lkp_UID),toString('Question Parent relationship error'),toString(null()))) ~> ComputeValidationField
ComputeValidationField select(mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectSourceColumns derive(Derived_NonNull_ParentUID = coalesce(Parent_UID, UID)) ~> DerivedNonNullParentUID
SelectColumns sink(input(
		UID as string,
		SLI_ID as string,
		Ops_Report_ID as string,
		Metric_Group as string,
		Metric_Sub_Group as string,
		Metric_Name as string,

	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(

SELECT count(*) Total_Error

SELECT [ORIGINAL_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOP_FULLPATH],
	[TARGET_BLOB_LANDING_CONTAINER],
	[TARGET_BLOB_NAME],
	[DATALAKE_CONTAINER],
	[DATALAKE_FILE_PATH],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_CONTAINER],
	[ORIGINAL_BLOB_ARCHIVE_FULLPATH],
	CONCAT(DATALAKE_CONTAINER,'/',DATALAKE_FILE_PATH,'/',TARGET_BLOB_NAME) AS DATALAKE_FULL_PATHFILE

WHERE [ETL_IS_PROCESSED] = 'N'
AND [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME] LIKE 'MAS_MNL_ASSET_%'
ORDER BY [ORIGINAL_BLOB_NAME];
